about_the_game:
CLONE yourself to create the deadliest army in the wasteland.
FRAG every mutant zombie in sight... but watch out for bandits that scavenge the bodies.
LEVEL UP and pick the best perks to boost your combat and cloning abilities.
DEPLOY your weapon as a sentry gun that automatically scans for targets.
THROW grenades and dynamite to take out the zombies feasting on your clones.
MAYHEM and noise will attract bandits and government troops.
BANDITS survive by looting and the government... they need every cloning device they can find.

If you like games where the ground turns crimson and messy with bits and pieces of zombie then this is the game for you!
> Over 50 Perks
> Over 60 Enemies
> Over 20 Weapons
> Play the maps in any order
> Clone yourself for extra Lives and build an Army

One Clone Left Features:
Single or multiplayer LAN
Co-op (up to 4 players) or death match (up to 6)
Most weapons have secondary functions
Enemy waves increase in difficulty
Survive getting caught between warring Factions
Destructible environments
Leveling system with randomized Perks to choose from
Finishing a map rewards you with a Permanent Perk
Randomized and varied map layouts
Maps feature scripted random Events and Enemies
NPC allies will fight for you and provide you with quests
Game difficulty adjusts for the number of players in the map
Weather effects
Day and night cycles and lots of blood and gore!

name: One Clone Left

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.1 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Does not support Online play. LAN play is supported.

short_description: Team up with friends to fight hordes of zombies and mutants that roam post-apocalyptic earth. Need extra lives and allies to help you fight? Just clone yourself and your weapons! Protect your fabricator to become an unstoppable force, able to take on any mutant in your sights.
